item.title: Mushrooms
item.description: I decided to go search some mushrooms, since I should prove my basic survival skills talents. Just kidding. I had nothing substantial to eat today. But this red phallic mushroom was very interesting. I think I've read about it somewhere but forgot its name. Probably Devils finger or something like
item.dc:creator: Leonid Kovalenko
item.content:encoded:
I decided to go search some mushrooms, since I should prove my basic survival skills talents. Just kidding. I had nothing substantial to eat today. But this red phallic mushroom was very interesting. I think I've read about it somewhere but forgot its name. Probably Devils finger or something like that. Another interesting one is this sun shaped:

There was a place with a lot of birds bones. I thought it was some bird eater's lair. For some reason I made no pictures of this.

Then I encountered someones hut deep in the forest. It looked more like a land of several hut buildings. I decided not to make a visit. Just went to gather mushrooms as the sun was going down.

And I was looking down all the way, so I have not noticed how got into some closed area. There was an abandoned bunker or something like that:

I'm not coming in. Just going further and getting out of this area through the weakness in a spiky fence. Looks like this place been long forgotten.

I got a lot of brown cap boletuses from the lair, quite a lot of oilers from the bunker area. It got dark, and I went to the car.

item.title: Titled
item.description: I used to update this website, trying to make those pictures showing up on mobile Safari. What is safari? Some kind of an african activity, I guess. Would be cool to attend one. Anyway, this website should mutate into something more meaningful with time. I would like to post some
item.dc:creator: Leonid Kovalenko
item.content:encoded: I used to update this website, trying to make those pictures showing up on mobile Safari. What is safari? Some kind of an african activity, I guess. Would be cool to attend one. Anyway, this website should mutate into something more meaningful with time. I would like to post some music. Lets see how far it can go.

item.title: Today
item.description: I woke up and felt like a gloomy sky. I tried to record a voice for this track again and again. I was invited to the birthday party. But some people are also supposed to be there, whom I may know. So I'm confused and don't want anything new. Being
item.dc:creator: Leonid Kovalenko
item.content:encoded: I woke up and felt like a gloomy sky. I tried to record a voice for this track again and again. I was invited to the birthday party. But some people are also supposed to be there, whom I may know. So I'm confused and don't want anything new. Being around people is difficult at times like this. Was asked to come, but want to say no. May be I should isolate and practice some confidence. But as the day goes I feel a bit better. So I decided to make a short visit and swam ahead like a leaky boat. I came when everyone started to leave. I'm not sure why. But does it matter. Just tried to record a voice for this track again and again ..

item.title: I'm tired
item.description:
This is what you probably do not want to hear from me. But anyway, this is a text dump on the outskirts of life. I write whatever.

I feel tired, especially at the first half of the day. This can manifest in the lack of energy, no purpose, and all
item.dc:creator: Leonid Kovalenko
item.content:encoded:
This is what you probably do not want to hear from me. But anyway, this is a text dump on the outskirts of life. I write whatever.

I feel tired, especially at the first half of the day. This can manifest in the lack of energy, no purpose, and all those kinds of things, they call a depression. This is true. I think it is a scourge of our time. I don't know, may be it is my own bubble, but some people told me they suffer from it. Practically most of the people I have a contact with have those kind of issues. And I think it is deep enough. You can admit it. But there are so many things today you can compensate with. I probably had it forever.

item.title: Experimenting
item.description: Alright. This is my first message. I'm sitting in a minivan. Piles of garbage are around me. But I'm searching for my little tunnel in this existence.
item.dc:creator: Leonid Kovalenko
item.content:encoded: Alright. This is my first message. I'm sitting in a minivan. Piles of garbage are around me. But I'm searching for my little tunnel in this existence.
